title: Australia. Ep. 5. Woy Woy to Wagga Wagga
brief_description: Spike Milligan takes a journey around “his” Australia, from Woy Woy where his mother lives, to Wagga Wagga - with Sydney and Canberra in between. His journey includes watching the Melbourne Cup with his mother, spinning yarns with locals in a pub, and the search for the great Australian joke. Milligan’s personal insight into Australia and Australians is both humorous and an interesting retrospective of the country in the 1980’s.
